text: Irena Kwiatkowska (17 September 19123 March 2011) was a Polish actress. She was known in Poland for her many cabaret roles and monologues. She appeared in comedy movies and television series. She was known for her role in Czterdziestolatek ("Being Forty", 1974–77) as "Kobieta Pracująca" ("Working Woman"). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1912 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Polish movie actors Category:Polish television actors Category:Polish stage actors Category:Polish radio actors Category:Polish comedians Category:Entertainers from Warsaw
title: Irena Kwiatkowska
